Title: FLOSS Weekly 730: Going Off the Grid with Meshtastic - Decentralized Open Source Mesh Network, Meshtastic
Description:
Doc Searls and Jonathan Bennett talk with Ben Meadors and Garth Vander Houwen of Meshtastic about adventures of many kinds—all using open source, off-grid, decentralized, mesh network that runs on inexpensive, low-power devices.

Hosts: Doc Searls and Jonathan Bennett

Guests: Ben Meadors and Garth Vander Houwen

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/floss-weekly
